raw_text:
Based on the provided paper, I'll extract the structured information following the requirements:

```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Impact Assessment of the Tingathe Economic Empowerment Pilot Project",
    "matches_expected_title": "YES"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "Tingathe Economic Empowerment Pilot Project (EEP)",
    "country": "Malawi",
    "region": "Mwanza and Neno districts",
    "target_population": "Ultra-poor and labor-constrained households who are beneficiaries of the Social Cash Transfer Programme (SCTP)"
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": true,
      "cash_support_type": "lump-sum transfer",
      "cash_amount": "MWK 50,000 (about USD 50)",
      "cash_frequency": "one-time",
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": "two randomly selected clusters receive a lump-sum transfer (MWK 50,000, or about USD 50)"
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": false,
      "assets_provided": [],
      "direct_provision": "NO",
      "assets_evidence_citation": null
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "financial literacy",
      "savings/financial",
      "income/earnings",
      "asset accumulation",
      "food security/nutrition",
      "consumption/expenditure",
      "poverty reduction",
      "resilience"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "We start with variables that are almost directlyand in a very short timeinfluenced by the project, such as financial knowledge, participation in the Village Savings and Loan (VSL) groups, and amount of savings... variables that reflect investments in productive activities... variables that can be seen as final outcomes of the EEP such as overall wealth, poverty, food security and ability to deal with shocks (resilience)",
    "study_design": "Randomized Controlled Trial (RCT)",
    "design_evidence_citation": "The impact assessment for the Economic Empowerment Pilot Project was carried out with an experimental study design, using longitudinal information... The quantitative survey design consists of a cluster-randomised control trial",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": "2016-2017",
    "sample_size": 800,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": true,
    "qualitative_methods": ["in-depth interviews", "focus group discussions"],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": "A mixed methods approach was employed, where results from quantitative surveys were triangulated with findings from qualitative interviews... The qualitative survey consists of a longitudinal study of 30 treatment households using a semi-structured household questionnaire",
    "has_cost_data": false,
    "cost_mentions": null,
    "cost_evidence_citation": null
  },
  "evidence_citations": {
    "program_name_citation": "The Tingathe Economic Empowerment Pilot Project (EEP) was jointly designed and implemented by the Social Protection Programme of the Deutsche Gesellschaft f√ºr Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) in cooperation with the Government of Malawi",
    "country_citation": "The district of Mwanza, located in the southwest part of Malawi is divided up into 20 clusters of neighbouring villages",
    "target_population_citation": "The EEP targets ultra-poor households that are supposed to have strong labour impediments (high dependency ratio)"
  }
}
```
